channel.title: Garry's Mod
channel.description:
Anyone else play this? I think its really fun, so I'll make a thread and see where it goes >.>
Post screenies and stuff about what you do when you play.. My favorite game mode is any of the RP servers.. I'm actually gonna start one eventually.
[img]http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/956140577780602696/053F187055F428D5DF080532D02854773014A5E1/[/img]
Me, a mutant, a terrorist, a ninja, and a thief all broke into the mayors office. When he opened the door we yelled surprise and the terrorist blew him up lol.
[img]http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/937000821282834189/84BE6B73AA9AA8837564AA326E94E9493B954D9D/[/img] One of the admins made a bus. When he unfroze it and everyone started getting prop killed, the surviors pulled out their guns and just made a blood bath lol

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

Every time a multi-player server tries to download a map I always get some kind of model error, so I have been sticking to servers that use the original maps.

Read full topic

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

DarkRP and TTT are my least favorite, and I just got the One Week achievement yesterday, as well as about 3 others. But this is my all time favorite game, and one of the few that my computer can handle.

Read full topic

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I cant stand RP, I spend too much time waiting for something cool to happen and 4 hours zooms by.

Read full topic

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Looks like a fun server. I’m always on Ra1n’s RP server, nothing special, just a decent community.
Beta for 13 just came out for all steam users who own Gmod 12, and it’s got potential, just needs quite a bit of work, can’t wait to see where he goes with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I have 300 hours clocked, mostly because of e2 ingame programming to make anything I want and the physical programming of wiremod

I make
Player-seeking missiles
Flying dragon e2 made out of holograms
Turn myself into that giant half life fish but size x100
paintball gun
I made a gun that shoots headcrabs, and I can enable it for other players in my paintball style crab arena
I have a tornado that sucks up props nearby, and I have a hurricane also
I have a Seal team 6 squad that follows me around from CSS

I made tons of shit

Im always on D3vine build, just google it. I like it because they protect everything you make so other players cant copy them

Read full topic
